synonyms.synonym: Cytochrome c oxidase subunit VIb isoform 1

protein.specific_function: Connects the two COX monomers into the physiological dimeric form

reference.reference_text: Taanman JW, Schrage C, Ponne N, Bolhuis P, de Vries H, Agsteribbe E: Nucleotide sequence of cDNA encoding subunit VIb of human cytochrome c oxidase. Nucleic Acids Res. 1989 Feb 25;17(4):1766.
